definition: medulla oblongata (the lower half of the brainstem)

sentences.english: To study Dorsolateral Medullary Syndrome with MRI.
sentences.chinese: 應用MRI研究延髓背外側綜合徵。

sentences.english: Objective To study safety paracentesis depth in cerebellomedullary cistern and its clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小腦延髓池安全穿刺深度及臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the diagnosis and the treatment of intramedullary hemangioblastoma of of medulla oblongata.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討延髓髓內血管母細胞瘤的診斷與治療。

sentences.english: It is generally believed that the medulla oblongata is the one of the tonicity sources of cardiovascular regulation.
sentences.chinese: 延髓腹外側區爲心血管調節的緊張性衝動來源之一。

sentences.english: The dvc is a reminder to us that we are in our last days.
sentences.chinese: 延髓的是提醒我們，我們是在最後幾天。

sentences.english: This energy enters the physical system through the medulla oblongata at the base of the neck.
sentences.chinese: 這個能量通過脖子底部的延髓進入物質身體系統。

sentences.english: The condyle and the jugular tubercle might block the visualization of the front of the medulla and the pontomedulla.
sentences.chinese: 頸靜脈結節和枕髁阻礙了腦橋延髓腹側的術野。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristics and therapy methods of dorsolateral medullary syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討延髓背外側綜合徵的臨牀特點及治療方法。

definition: basilar artery (central artery of the brain)

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

definition: efferent nerve (transmitting out from the brain)/efferent neuron/motor nerve
